subject: Volleyball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The United States defeated Argentina, 25-16, 25-19, 25-18, at the men’s volleyball World Cup in Tokyo to move a step closer to qualifying for the Beijing Olympics. Brazil (9-1) secured an Olympic berth by beating Russia.
snippet: The United States defeated Argentina, 25-16, 25-19, 25-18, at the men’s volleyball World Cup in Tokyo to move a step closer to qualifying for the Beijing Olympics. Brazil (9-1) secured an Olympic berth by beating Russia.
